front.title: An Offset Indicating Option for IPv6

abstract.t: This document defines an Offset Indicating option (OI option) encapsulated within the IPv6 Hop-by-Hop Options header. An OI option can provide offset information to locate the end of the IPv6 header chain so that a node receiving an IPv6 packet is able to skip over the IP header chain and access the transport header or other protocol data unit directly.
